SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accessor<T>
Accessors are used to extract values from objects.
AccessorRegistry
A registry of accessors.
AccessorRegistry.Builder
A builder class for AccessorRegistry instances.
CamelCaseToSnakeLowerCase
Converts camel case identifiers to snake case identifiers.
CamelCaseToSnakeUpperCase
Converts camel case identifiers to snake case identifiers.
CamelCaseToWordCase
Converts camel case identifiers to word case identifiers.
NameMapper
Generic name mapping interface.
ParseErrorCode
Symbolic constants for syntax errors and other types of errors in a Klojang template.
ParseException
Thrown if the template source could not be parsed into a Template.
PathResolver
Path resolvers are used by the template parser to load the source code for a template.
Regex
Tokens and regular expressions used by the template parser to parse templates.
RenderErrorCode
Symbolic constants for errors that may occur while populating or rendering a template.
RenderException
Thrown from a RenderSession under various circumstances.
RenderSession
A RenderSession lets you populate a template and then render it.
Setting
Specifies all system properties and/or environment variables that will be picked up by Klojang Templates.
SnakeCaseToCamelCase
Converts snake case identifiers to word case identifiers.
SnakeCaseToWordCase
Converts snake case identifiers to word case identifiers.
Stringifier
A stringifier is responsible for stringifying the values coming back from the data access layer.
StringifierRegistry
A registry of stringifiers used by the RenderSession to stringify the values coming back from the data access layer.
StringifierRegistry.Builder
A builder class for StringifierRegistry instances.
Template
The Template class is responsible for loading and parsing templates and functions as a factory for RenderSession objects.
TemplateUtils
Utility class extending the functionality of the Template class.
VarGroup
Variable groups provide a mechanism to group template variables across one or more templates in order to make them use a shared Stringifier.
WordCaseToCamelCase
Converts word case identifiers to came cal identifiers.
WordCaseToSnakeLowerCase
Converts word case identifiers to snake case identifiers.
WordCaseToSnakeUpperCase
Converts camel case identifiers to snake case identifiers.
